title: Being in: Life Be In It
brief_description: Examines the ‘Life Be In It’ campaign, its progress and the continued support it needs form members of the community, and advocates ways of becoming a part of the program. The ‘Life Be In It’ campaign was aimed at fostering community involvement in physical recreation, physical fitness and healthier lifestyles for all Australian.
